catalog_info.title: Upper-Level Classical Arabic I
catalog_info.notes: Not open to auditors. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 4353.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Arabic Ba or equivalent, or may be taken separately with permission of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: Concentration on readings from classical Islamic texts, with emphasis on Qur'an, hadîth, sîra, and tafsîr literature; directed readings and textual analysis; review of classical Arabic morphology and syntax.
